original_solution_mapping.L1: The shop offers 100 flavors and she tried 1/4 of the flavors so she had 100*.25 = <<100*.25=25>>25 flavors 2 years ago
original_solution_mapping.L2: Last year she ate double the amount from the previous year so she had 25*2 = <<25*2=50>>50 flavors
original_solution_mapping.L3: 2 years ago she ate 25 flavors and last year she had 50 flavors so she has had 25+50 = <<25+50=75>>75 flavors
original_solution_mapping.L4: The shop offers 100 flavors and she has had 75 flavors so she still needs to try 100-75 = <<100-75=25>>25 flavors

original_function_code:
def solve():
    """Index: 3006.
    Returns: the number of flavors Gretchen still needs to try.
    """
    # L1
    total_flavors = 100 # 100 different flavors
    two_years_ago_fraction_decimal = 0.25 # 1/4 of the flavors
    flavors_two_years_ago = total_flavors * two_years_ago_fraction_decimal

    # L2
    double_factor = 2 # double that amount
    flavors_last_year = flavors_two_years_ago * double_factor

    # L3
    total_flavors_tried_so_far = flavors_two_years_ago + flavors_last_year

    # L4
    flavors_to_try_this_year = total_flavors - total_flavors_tried_so_far

    # FA
    answer = flavors_to_try_this_year
    return answer

logical_steps.solution_line_template: The shop offers {total_flavors} flavors and she tried 1/4 of the flavors so she had {total_flavors}*{two_years_ago_fraction_decimal} = <<{total_flavors}*{two_years_ago_fraction_decimal}={flavors_two_years_ago}>>{flavors_two_years_ago} flavors 2 years ago

Last year she ate double the amount from the previous year so she had {flavors_two_years_ago}*{double_factor} = <<{flavors_two_years_ago}*{double_factor}={flavors_last_year}>>{flavors_last_year} flavors

2 years ago she ate {flavors_two_years_ago} flavors and last year she had {flavors_last_year} flavors so she has had {flavors_two_years_ago}+{flavors_last_year} = <<{flavors_two_years_ago}+{flavors_last_year}={total_flavors_tried_so_far}>>{total_flavors_tried_so_far} flavors

The shop offers {total_flavors} flavors and she has had {total_flavors_tried_so_far} flavors so she still needs to try {total_flavors}-{total_flavors_tried_so_far} = <<{total_flavors}-{total_flavors_tried_so_far}={flavors_to_try_this_year}>>{flavors_to_try_this_year} flavors

explanation: Incorrect final answer. An intermediate value 'total_flavors_tried_so_far' (value: 75.0) was reported instead of 'flavors_to_try_this_year' (value: 25.0).
